snippet: A local man in Glen Cove, N.Y., bought an abandoned mansion and invited graffiti artists to paint it for an exhibition....

headline.main: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia
headline.print_headline: AP PHOTOS: Editor Selections From the Past Week in Asia

lead_paragraph: A local man in Glen Cove, N.Y., bought an abandoned mansion and invited graffiti artists to paint it for an exhibition.
